item.title: Revamping the Microsoft Graph Java SDK: a recipe to revive open-source repositories
item.description:
Introduction

Back in August 2020 I became the main maintainer of the Microsoft Graph Java SDK.

The team had to deprioritize this SDK in favor of other languages due to a lack of staff. About 100+ issues were open, as well as 15 pull requests from the community. Dependencies and tooling had not been updated, the Android story was unclear, no innovation had been done in a long time, the repository felt abandoned and caused a lot of frustrationsâ€¦
